title: Font identification help...
content:
Can anyone tell me what font this might be?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [0634\_001.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017053435/http:/typophile.com/files/0634_001.jpg) | 509.04 KB |

comments.content:
That's Busorama and it belongs (next time) in the Type ID board

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/busorama/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017053435/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/busorama/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/urw/busorama/")
Thank you - my apologies for the improper posting...
